message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable.  I'm asking for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $105 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $110?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $108. Can you meet me at that price?
